commands.name: append
commands.description: Append data to the saved data for a template

commands.name: delete
commands.description: Delete a saved template (does not remove the files)

commands.name: list
commands.description: List the names of all saved templates

commands.name: new
commands.description: Save a jade file and json file as a new template

commands.name: read
commands.description: Print a value from within a template to the console

commands.name: remove
commands.description: Delete the value of a key within a template's data

commands.name: render
commands.description: Render a template to the terminal background

commands.name: show
commands.description: Print a template and its data to the console

commands.name: write
commands.description: Write data to the saved data for a template
